_source.short_desc: GradAdvance by Graduway is the leading digital fundraising solution to manage giving days, crowdfunding, and annual campaigns.
_source.long_desc: GradAdvance by Graduway is a leading provider of digital fundraising solutions. Proven to be effective for giving days, crowdfunding, and annual campaigns, Graduway's full suite of tools enhance your efforts for more impactful outcomes, attracting more donors and raising more dollars.
_source.pricing_details:
Pricing information is available on inquiry.
Please contact us at: https://graduway.com/pricing/
_source.target_audience: Admission Leaders, Alumni Relations Leaders, Community Builders/Managers, Career Services Professionals, Fundraising & Development Leaders.

category_features.name: Alumni Management
category_features.definition: Provides educational institutions and other fundraising organizations with tools to cultivate and stay connected with alumni.

category_features.name: Auction Management
category_features.definition: Allows businesses to create and manage auctions.

category_features.name: CRM
category_features.definition: Contact and lead management to track interactions and notes about clients and prospects

category_features.name: Campaign Management
category_features.definition: Create a collection of marketing actions to complete specific goals

category_features.name: Contribution Tracking
category_features.definition: View track donor contribution history

category_features.name: Donor Discovery
category_features.definition: Search 3rd party databases to identify potential donors

category_features.name: Donor Management
category_features.definition: Track and maintain donor relationships throughout various stages/activities including contact information and previous outreach

category_features.name: Event Management
category_features.definition: Schedule and manage the logistics of activities and other gatherings

category_features.name: Gift Matching Management
category_features.definition: Ability to match gifts through the system

category_features.name: Grant Management
category_features.definition: Monitor application statuses, proposals and award funds

category_features.name: Membership Management
category_features.definition: Database of members to track personal information of individuals and families

category_features.name: Mobile Giving
category_features.definition: Ability to make a donation from a mobile device/app

category_features.name: Payment Processing
category_features.definition: Accept, record, and reconcile financial transactions

category_features.name: Pledge Management
category_features.definition: Track commitments to donate in the future

category_features.name: Recurring Giving
category_features.definition: Manage and track recurring gifts

category_features.name: Volunteer Management
category_features.definition: Manage volunteer information and direct volunteer resources

category_features.name: Candidate Management
category_features.definition: Build, track, and maintain relationships with candidates.

category_features.name: Fee Management
category_features.definition: Track collected or paid charges for services performed or access granted

category_features.name: K-12
category_features.definition: Software designed for kindergarten through 12th grade schools

category_features.name: Self Service Portal
category_features.definition: Gateway through which end users can access the system

category_features.name: Fundraising Management
category_features.definition: Activities related to raising money for a specific cause

category_features.name: Content Management
category_features.definition: Creating, updating, monitoring accuracy, and ensuring brand consistency for all written materials that are distributed to stakeholders.

category_features.name: Discussions / Forums
category_features.definition: Online forums/groups where users can ask questions, share ideas, best practices, etc.

category_features.name: Event Management
category_features.definition: Schedule and manage the logistics of activities and other gatherings

category_features.name: Group Management
category_features.definition: Organize and edit a group of people's policy and members

category_features.name: Ideation
category_features.definition: The creation, development, sharing and storage of potentially innovative new ideas

category_features.name: Member Directory
category_features.definition: Online or printable list/directory of members (for external use)

category_features.name: Membership Management
category_features.definition: Database of members to track personal information of individuals and families

category_features.name: Moderation
category_features.definition: Controls/tools to moderate the session

category_features.name: Website Management
category_features.definition: Website builder or integration with 3rd party site

category_features.name: Action Item Tracking
category_features.definition: Track the status of discussed/agreed tasks

category_features.name: Appointment Scheduling
category_features.definition: Book appointments via calendar

category_features.name: Curriculum Management
category_features.definition: Map out the subjects that comprise courses of study

category_features.name: Goal Management
category_features.definition: Allows employees to set and manage work or career related goals

category_features.name: Mentor/Coach Matching
category_features.definition: Match mentors and mentees through self-matching, admin-led matching, or automatically based on skills, interests and other parameters

category_features.name: Mentoring Program Management
category_features.definition: Set up and manage all aspects of mentoring programs, including registration, mentor-mentee pairing, curriculum, activity reporting etc.

category_features.name: Progress Tracking
category_features.definition: Reporting on how each task or process has advanced since its initiation

related_products.short_desc: Bloomerang's donor management software helps fundraisers save more time, raise more funds, and do more good.
related_products.features:
Bloomerang helps nonprofits deliver a better giving experience so they can save time, raise more funds, and create lasting change. With our donor management software, you'll have access to: 

- Email Marketing Tools
- Letters & Mailings Templates
- An Integrations Hub
- Online Giving Pages & Forms
- Peer-to-Peer Fundraising Tools
- Reporting & Analytics
- Automatic Data Updates

related_products.short_desc: DonorPerfect empowers your team to work together, raise more money, and cultivate relationships that keep your mission moving forward.
related_products.features: Nonprofits raise 20% more funds in their first year using DonorPerfect. It's the most comprehensive solution in fundraising. Manage donations, contacts, receipting, reporting, email, and fundraising initiatives from a single system. With automatic monthly giving, integrated online donation forms, standard and custom reports, Constant Contact email, auction management, and a network of integrated partner solutions, DonorPerfect is ideal for organizations of all sizes.

related_products.short_desc: QuickBooks is an end-to-end accounting software that can grow with your business.
related_products.features: With QuickBooks Online Advanced you can organize your books, complete tasks that matter faster with automated approvals and reminders, and stay on top of your cash flow. With the revenue streams dashboard, you can understand which fundraisers and donors are strongest and which need help. You can also create board-ready presentations intuitively. With 24/7 premium care, get the support you need.

related_products.short_desc: Church management software with membership, contributions, attendance, visitation, picture/portrait, and more.
related_products.features:
Too many programs make fund-raising complicated. Fund-raising should be fun, simple, and easily managed.  If people want to know where they are with their giving and how much they owe, this should be a simple thing to report.  Servant Keeper makes it so easy!

Join the 30,000+ non-profits that have discovered the secret to simplifying fund-raising while increasing donations.

related_products.short_desc: Thousands of small nonprofits rely on Network for Good's simple and smart fundraising software to cultivate relationships with donors a
related_products.features:
Reach your fundraising goals, connect with supporters, and advance your mission with Network for Good's all-in-one fundraising software.

Built for small and growing nonprofits, only Network for Good is designed to help you become a better fundraiser.

Get donor management, powerful communication tools, online fundraising features, and more-all in one integrated software. Plus, our best-in-class onboarding, customer service, and data migration are always included.

related_products.short_desc: Neon CRM is the leading all-in-one fundraising & donation software on the market. Raise more and increase your organization's impact.
related_products.features:
Our fully-branded forms allow you to integrate any fundraising campaign seamlessly with your website at no additional cost. 

With Neon CRM, you can manage donors, campaigns, events, volunteers - your whole operation out of a single, unified software. Our relationship-focused approach to software ensures that your organization's personal touch is never lost - but time consuming manual work is.

Over 3,000 organizations are raising more with Neon CRM. Ready for a better fundraising tool?

related_products.short_desc: GiveGab is the #1 digital fundraising solution for Giving Days and year-round giving. Experience the JOY of fundraising with GiveGab!
related_products.features:
GiveGab is becoming Bonterra. Learn more at www.bonterratech.com.

GiveGab is the #1 digital solution for Giving Days and year-round fundraising tailored to nonprofit networks, community foundations, education institutions, hospital foundations, and public media outlets. GiveGab provides a modern and secure platform built on technology inspired by the feedback of our customers, resulting in products and features tailored to the most popular requests of our partners.

related_products.short_desc: Auctria: a budget friendly web solution to run your entire event from tickets to receipts; traditional auctions or online fundraisers.
related_products.features: Auctria makes live, silent, online, virutal, hybrid auction & event fundraisers easy & affordable for groups large and small. Handle ticket sales, bids, purchases & donations. Track donors & items.  Produce printed forms as needed. Integrated credit card processing optional & accept online donations. Mobile and text-based bidding available. Completely transparent pricing with no performance fees. Explore our demo or get started with a free account to try it out.

related_products.short_desc: Fundraising solution that helps you communicate with your constituents and make better decisions.
related_products.features: Raisers Edge NXT is a smart, cloud fundraising solution built to help nonprofits achieve sustainable growth. It's a total solution that includes all the tools needed to be successful on one platform and one simple subscription price. This includes data enrichment services, event management, and social and email marketing tools, online donations, flexible reporting and actionable analytics.  Raisers Edge NXT pulls together your processes and people to move your entire mission forward.

related_products.short_desc: Event management software for charitable fundraising including silent auctions, live auctions, online bidding, mobile bidding & more!
related_products.features: Simplify every aspect of running your charitable event!  Sell tickets, Online, Mobile and paper-based bidding options. Manage contacts, track donations, create auction bundles and printed material.  Eliminate check-in / check-in lines, store credit cards, write thank you letters and more.  Simple, affordable and powerful event management software for any charitable organization including Schools, Churches, Community Service Organizations.  Night of your event support, video tutorials and more.

related_products.short_desc: Online donation platform & fundraising software for nonprofits. Includes donation forms, mass email, SMS, QB integration, and more.
related_products.features: Discover why thousands of nonprofits have trusted DonorSnap for over a decade. DonorSnap is an all-in-one fundraising software for nonprofits. Save countless administrative hours with time-saving tools and integrations. Take your fundraising to the next level with robust reporting and communication tools. Pricing starts at $39 per month. Try DonorSnap with your own data risk-free for 30 days.

similar_products.short_desc: EveryAction - a unified nonprofit CRM solution built to increase efficiency, optimize multichannel fundraising, & advance your mission.
similar_products.features: Get more from and do more with your donor data. EveryAction's unified CRM and nonprofit fundraising software gives you a 360-degree view of your donors, empowering you to run automated, personalized, omni-channel fundraising campaigns by managing online and offline fundraising from the same, powerful platform. With best-in-class fundraising, membership, advocacy and analytics tools built and supported by nonprofit experts, EveryAction enables organizations of all sizes to advance their missions.

similar_products.short_desc: Eleo is designed with new and seasoned fundraisers in mind.
similar_products.features:
Eleo is designed for new and seasoned fundraisers. Complete with every feature, integration, and report you need to build strong relationships with your donors. Send effective communications and analyze your fundraising efforts.  Eleo comes equipped with event, volunteer, membership and grant modules.

Pricing starts at $39/month for up to 2,500 contacts and includes live support, trainings, data import, & more.

similar_products.short_desc: Neon CRM is the leading all-in-one fundraising & donation software on the market. Raise more and increase your organization's impact.
similar_products.features:
Our fully-branded forms allow you to integrate any fundraising campaign seamlessly with your website at no additional cost. 

With Neon CRM, you can manage donors, campaigns, events, volunteers - your whole operation out of a single, unified software. Our relationship-focused approach to software ensures that your organization's personal touch is never lost - but time consuming manual work is.

Over 3,000 organizations are raising more with Neon CRM. Ready for a better fundraising tool?

similar_products.short_desc: Givebutter is a free fundraising platform bringing together everything changemakers need to successfully raise funds for good causes.
similar_products.features: Givebutter is the #1 rated fundraising platform on G2, powering $300m+ in donations for more than a million changemakers worldwide. Nonprofits use Givebutter to replace multiple categories of tools, including donation forms, fundraisers, events, donor management (CRM), email, texting, and more. Instead of charging a traditional SaaS subscription fee, Givebutter is completely free to use with a 100% transparent tip-or-fee model. Givebutter has been certified as a Great Place to Work in 2022.

similar_products.short_desc: Fundraising Software offering: Online Giving | Virtual Fundraising | Peer-to-Peer | Event Management | Text2Give | Tributes & Memorials
similar_products.features:
OneCause fundraising software offers an intuitive, reliable and affordable solution. Providing the ability to manage multiple live or virtual fundraisers annually allowing any-sized organization to connect more donors to your cause.

Software offers: online giving | virtual fundraising | streaming video | peer-to-peer | tributes & memorial gifts | giving days | run, walk, rides | event management | online auctions & mobile bidding | reporting & analytics | online, phone & email support.

similar_products.short_desc:
Funraise provides digital fundraising tech to build your nonprofit's movement & make enterprise-size impact. 

Get started for Free!
similar_products.features:
Funraise provides exceptional, friendly digital fundraising technology. Built with innovation and nonprofit experience, Funraise's state-of-the-art fundraising tools integrate every critical aspect of fundraising management into a single platform, making it fun to create lasting impact with nonprofit-first technology. Experience why organizations like United Nations HCR and National Wildlife Federation trust Funraise to power their fundraising. 

Because your cause is our cause.

Manage contacts, track donations, create auction bundles and printed material.  Eliminate check-in / check-in lines, store credit cards, write thank you letters and more.  Simple, affordable and powerful event management software for any charitable organization including Schools, Churches, Community Service Organizations.  Night of your event support, video tutorials and more.

similar_products.short_desc: We offer a true all-in-one solution! Try our complete Online Giving, Donor Management, and Fund Accounting system for free.
similar_products.features: Nonprofits love Continue To Give because we offer a true all-in-one solution! We have the complete Online Giving, Donor Management, and Fund Accounting in one.  You'll raise more money with our Text, Mobile, App, Website, Social, and Peer to Peer Fundraising options. Plus, you are able to sell event tickets, build meaningful relationships, and more with our Donor Management System. Then, to top it off, you can drop your accounting software, because we built that too! Switch today and Save!

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Donation Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Donation Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Donation Management software helps nonprofit organizations collect, track, and distribute funds contributed by their patrons, maintain donors' information, and connect with them during fundraising campaigns. Payment processing capabilities as well as contact management features are essential parts of this software. For related software solutions see Fundraising software, Grant Management software and Payment Processing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Fund Accounting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Fund Accounting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Fund Accounting software automates accounting and portfolio management functions for nonprofit organizations, alternative asset managers, private bankers, foundations and government agencies. Fund administrators utilize these applications to assist in strategic decision making and to increase accountability across an organization's financial operations. Fund Accounting software also assists with regulatory compliance management and financial reporting on portfolio performance. Fund Accounting software is related to Accounting software and Government software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Membership Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Membership Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Membership Management software automates the management of membership within associations, communities ,and other member-based organizations. These software packages typically offer many features to empower and inform group members as well as administration and business process tools for organizations. A variety of membership-oriented groups use these software applications to communicate with their constituents, share resources, promote events, and collect fees as well as to recruit and retain members. Membership Management software is related to Association Management software, Church Management software and Club Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Nonprofit software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Nonprofit tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Nonprofit software automates all aspects of nonprofit operations from database management, to fundraising, to accounting and CRM. Nonprofit software is related to Donation Management software and Nonprofit Accounting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Political Campaign software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Political Campaign tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Political Campaign software provides financial and management tools, contribution tracking, a voter database, and other features to help political candidates and PACs more effectively manage campaigns. Campaign managers use these software applications to efficiently identify likely donors, target voters for outreach efforts, manage volunteers, track contributions, and assess the effectiveness of campaigns. Political Campaign software also typically offers demographic and voter behavior data, polling tools, call center integration and other campaign management necessities such as regulatory compliance monitoring. Political Campaign software is related to Fundraising software.

_source.short_desc: Virtual community and enablement tools to recruit and mentor students, engage alumni and volunteers, and cultivate donors at scale.
_source.long_desc:
Graduway offers five different products to unleash the power of connections and access a broad network:

1. Admission tool: Peerpal from Graduway
2. Community engagement tool: GradEngage
3. Mentoring tool: GradCareers
4. Fundraising tool: GradAdvance
5. Fundraising enablement: Gravyty 

Graduway works with 2,000+ schools, colleges, non-profits, and healthcare organizations globally, and has offices in London, Boston, Seattle, and Tel Aviv.

To learn more: https://graduway.com/
_source.pricing_details:
Pricing information is available on inquiry.
Please contact us at: https://graduway.com/pricing/
_source.target_audience: Admission Leaders, Alumni Relations Leaders, Community Builders/Managers, Career Services Professionals, Fundraising & Development Leaders.

related_products.short_desc: Keep your launches smooth and your communication clear by using Trello to see which tasks are on track, and which content is up next.
related_products.features: From planning a launch, to editorial calendar content, to meeting agendas and everything in between, Trello helps your marketing teams get more done. Trello is the command center that connects all your tasks and tools to show status updates, due dates, and allows you to quickly comment back and forth to teammates. Attach files and tickets from other apps like Google Docs and Salesforce, so everything stays together. Keep launches smooth and your whole marketing team on the same page.

related_products.short_desc: Hootsuite helps you build your brand, strengthen connections with customers, and drive real business results with social media.
related_products.features: Social media is a wild place to do business. That's why thousands of brands rely on Hootsuite's tools and expertise to bring order to the chaos. Launch brilliant social campaigns, deliver 5-star social commerce experiences, and manage all your customer conversations in one place. Plus, get access to industry leading certifications, training, and coaching to help you push your results on social media further, faster.

related_products.short_desc: Social media solution that helps businesses manage content, create and edit posts, and monitor engagement across Instagram accounts.
related_products.features: Social media solution that helps businesses manage content, create and edit posts, and monitor engagement across Instagram accounts.

related_products.short_desc: Social media marketing solution that helps businesses create personalized marketing plans based on targeted audience and budget.
related_products.features: Social media marketing solution that helps businesses create personalized marketing plans based on targeted audience and budget.

related_products.short_desc: Workplace connects everyone in an organization using familiar Facebook features like chat, video calling, posts and groups.
related_products.features: Workplace connects everyone in an organization using familiar Facebook features like Chat, video calling, posts and Groups. It integrates with the business tools you already use and provides a simple, secure and more productive way for people to share knowledge, work together and build connected communities.

related_products.short_desc: #1 social intranet and private social networking software for businesses used by over 8 million businesses worldwide.
related_products.features: Bitrix24 is free social intranet software available both in cloud and on premise. It's 100% free when used by small teams. Bitrix24 comes with over 30 free intranet tools, open source code, mobile apps, API, content management systems, social and classic interfaces, and integrations for Active Directory, SharePoint lists, Outlook and MS Exchange. Unlimited user plans are available.

related_products.short_desc: Sprout Social offers social media engagement, publishing, analytics, listening and reporting solutions for leading agencies and brands.
related_products.features: Sprout Social offers social media engagement, publishing, analytics, listening and reporting solutions for leading agencies and brands including Loews Hotel, NBC Universal, Macys, Chipotle and Sony. Available via web browser, iOS and Android, Sprout enables brands to simplify social management, collaborate across teams and provide an exceptional customer experience. Sprout Social supports Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, LinkedIn, and Pinterest.

related_products.short_desc: All-in-one Social Media Management solution for publishing, reporting, influencer marketing, benchmarking, and engagement.
related_products.features: Brandwatch (formerly Falcon.io) offers is a leading solution for social media monitoring, engagement, publishing, analytics, and customer data management. It enables brands to explore the full potential of digital marketing and advertising by managing multiple customer touchpoints while allowing marketers to deliver more personalized brand experiences based on enriched customer profiles.

related_products.short_desc: A full fledged alumni management solution (SAAS) for educational institutions & corporates to build their exclusive alumni networks.
related_products.features:
Helps educational institutions in managing alumni database and improving alumni engagement with 450+ clients across 20 regions including India, Australia, Europe, Malaysia, Indonesia, Middle East, Africa, Japan, Philippines, USA, West Indies.

Helps Corporates to stay connected with former staff, enhancing employer branding, re-hiring and referrals, One-stop Exits Helpdesk for all the alumni queries trusted by Corporates like Qualcomm, TataSteel, RBEI, organizations like United Nations GESCI.

related_products.short_desc: NiceJob is the easiest way to highlight your customer reviews across social media. Turn your reviews into stories and social posts.
related_products.features: With NiceJob, highlighting your customer reviews across social media is easy. Our social sharing feature allows you to turn your reviews into stories and posts that you can share with the push of a button. Our software picks out the best lines and turns them into images that can be displayed across different social channels, taking word-of-mouth marketing to the next level.

related_products.short_desc: MangoApps is a unified communications and social networking platform that serves as a bridge between desk and deskless workers.
related_products.features: MangoApps is a communications and social networking platform that serves as a bridge between desk and deskless workers. Everyone can sign into our user-friendly platform from whatever device suits them best, and get a custom dashboard, flexible notification settings, and a simple, streamlined experience. This ensures that everyone can get to the conversations  that hey need, with no barriers, and makes it easy for your company to push out consistent, engaging messages to the entire workforce.

similar_products.short_desc: Unlock the potential of your community with the most flexible and powerful all-in-one social network solution for community management.
similar_products.features: Unlock the potential of your community with Hivebrite, the most advanced all-in-one social networking platform. Easy to set up and fully branded to match your colors, Hivebrite helps you build brand engagement and create opportunities for your private social network. Manage your member database, centralize the communication with your members, create events and collect online payments, all from a single user-friendly interface.

similar_products.short_desc: Create your own social network with an activity feed, member profiles, sub-groups and more.
similar_products.features: A Mighty Network gives you the ability to create your own social network with an activity feed, member profiles, sub-groups, chat messages and more, on the web, native iOS and Android apps, all under your brand. No ads and fully private if you choose. Create articles with a rich CMS, embed images, videos and sound files, and post engaging questions and polls, all of which support comments and cheers. You can even charge for access with a one-time payment or a subscription, monthly or annually.

similar_products.short_desc: Launch your own community & social networking apps with no code. Includes VIP support and app maintenance.
similar_products.features:
Mighty Pro is for brands, organizations, and successful creators who understand the power of bringing your people together in your own branded apps. 

It's a community you own on the web and available in the Apple App Store and Google Play Store, delivered on your own native iOS, iPad, and Android apps. 

Mix and match features like livestreaming, native video, fun group chat, paid and free membership plans, plus online events, flexible groups, and immersive branding options.

similar_products.short_desc: More than ever, we need a place to bring everyone together and help each person succeed. That's Jostle.
similar_products.features: Discover a seriously simple platform that brings people together. Why? Because today's organizations are more complex than ever: people are dispersed, there's more info, and we have more ways to communicate than ever before. Striving to create a community at your workplace is an important goal, but it shouldn't add to this complexity. You need a way to help people participate in your culture and feel the value of the contribution they make. Jostle is designed to empower people and organizations.

similar_products.short_desc: All-in-one Social Media Management solution for publishing, reporting, influencer marketing, benchmarking, and engagement.

It enables brands to explore the full potential of digital marketing and advertising by managing multiple customer touchpoints while allowing marketers to deliver more personalized brand experiences based on enriched customer profiles.

similar_products.short_desc: idloom.wall gathers all the best tools social media have to offer within one single multipurpose intra-extranet platform.
similar_products.features: idloom.wall is a revolutionary intra-extranet platform, combining the righteousness of traditional intranet solutions with the power of social media features and applications. Specialized in knowledge and expertise management, idloom.wall combines the strength of a collaborative platform with the flexibility and agility of a social network that you can taylor-fit to your organization's particular needs.

Our social sharing feature allows you to turn your reviews into stories and posts that you can share with the push of a button. Our software picks out the best lines and turns them into images that can be displayed across different social channels, taking word-of-mouth marketing to the next level.

similar_products.short_desc: Raklet is an all-in-one social networking software that allows you to engage with your community in a meaningful, digital way.
similar_products.features:
Raklet is an all-in-one social networking software that allows you to engage with your community in a meaningful, digital way. 

Build, grow and monetize your audience through memberships, newsletters and other tools.

On top of a powerful CRM, you can create tiered membership plans, a custom application form, organize events & sell tickets, have your private social network, branded mobile app, and much more. It's the most simple and easy way to increase engagement and grow your social network.

similar_products.short_desc: #1 social intranet and private social networking software for businesses used by over 8 million businesses worldwide.
similar_products.features: Bitrix24 is free social intranet software available both in cloud and on premise. It's 100% free when used by small teams. Bitrix24 comes with over 30 free intranet tools, open source code, mobile apps, API, content management systems, social and classic interfaces, and integrations for Active Directory, SharePoint lists, Outlook and MS Exchange. Unlimited user plans are available.

similar_products.short_desc: HipSocial by 500apps is an all-in-one social media management tool helping businesses to manage social media accounts from one place
similar_products.features: HipSocial by 500apps helps businesses increase their social engagements and unlock the true power of social listening. With HipSocial, businesses can plan, schedule, and track content across various social networks with proper workflow. HipSocial also helps businesses go through brand mentions and engage with them separately. Along with that, they also receive detailed analytics reports of your posts.

similar_products.short_desc: MangoApps is a unified communications and social networking platform that serves as a bridge between desk and deskless workers.
similar_products.features: MangoApps is a communications and social networking platform that serves as a bridge between desk and deskless workers. Everyone can sign into our user-friendly platform from whatever device suits them best, and get a custom dashboard, flexible notification settings, and a simple, streamlined experience. This ensures that everyone can get to the conversations  that hey need, with no barriers, and makes it easy for your company to push out consistent, engaging messages to the entire workforce.

similar_products.short_desc: The #1 student-to-student marketing solution for student admissions, purpose-built for higher education.
similar_products.features:
Unibuddy is the #1 student-to-student marketing solution that helps recruiters build authentic connections and empowers prospective students to feel confident in their school choice.

It is quick and easy to set-up, simple to use for everyone, it seamlessly integrates with your CRM, and offers training and support for your team.

Join 500+ institutions that use Unibuddy and have successfully scaled their admissions efforts.

similar_products.short_desc: Keep your launches smooth and your communication clear by using Trello to see which tasks are on track, and which content is up next.
similar_products.features: From planning a launch, to editorial calendar content, to meeting agendas and everything in between, Trello helps your marketing teams get more done. Trello is the command center that connects all your tasks and tools to show status updates, due dates, and allows you to quickly comment back and forth to teammates. Attach files and tickets from other apps like Google Docs and Salesforce, so everything stays together. Keep launches smooth and your whole marketing team on the same page.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Collaboration software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Collaboration tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Collaboration software enables the sharing of information by providing an online or intranet-based environment for virtual teamwork. These applications allow for greater efficiency in managing document libraries and versions, projects in progress, report editing, threaded discussions, calendar sharing, knowledge base search, workflow and task management. Collaboration solutions often feature integration for a variety of real-time communications tools including: video or voice conferencing, email and instant messaging. Collaboration software is related to Project Management software and Web Conferencing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Community software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Community tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Community software allows businesses to connect with their customers by creating a space for sharing ideas, collecting opinions, storing Q&A data, and interacting with fellow customers and business representatives.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Membership Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Membership Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Membership Management software automates the management of membership within associations, communities ,and other member-based organizations. These software packages typically offer many features to empower and inform group members as well as administration and business process tools for organizations. A variety of membership-oriented groups use these software applications to communicate with their constituents, share resources, promote events, and collect fees as well as to recruit and retain members. Membership Management software is related to Association Management software, Church Management software and Club Management software.

related_categories.description: Mobile Event Apps enable event organizers to consistently distribute important event information to the attendees in real time and facilitate networking among attendees.
